entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Coaticook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:16 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
